clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Used in the treatment of hyperlipidemias abnormally elevated levels of any or all lipids and or lipoproteins in the blood

incompatibilities.description: Acipimox may increase the myopathic rhabdomyolysis activities of Pravastatin
Acipimox may increase the myopathic rhabdomyolysis activities of Lovastatin
Acipimox may increase the myopathic rhabdomyolysis activities of Cerivastatin
Acipimox may increase the myopathic rhabdomyolysis activities of Simvastatin
Acipimox may increase the myopathic rhabdomyolysis activities of Atorvastatin
Acipimox may increase the myopathic rhabdomyolysis activities of Fluvastatin
Acipimox may increase the myopathic rhabdomyolysis activities of Rosuvastatin
Acipimox may increase the myopathic rhabdomyolysis activities of Mevastatin
Acipimox may increase the myopathic rhabdomyolysis activities of Pitavastatin
The risk or severity of myopathy rhabdomyolysis and myoglobinuria can be increased when Leuprolide is combined with Acipimox
